Invocation Name: business podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Gulf News weekly business podcast discussing the biggest stories form the Middle East and worldwide. 

Every week our team of experts dive into the latest market trends, tech news and issues affecting business here in the UAE, the Middle East and around the world. 

Lively, intelligent, sometimes controversial and always insightful, our Business reporters, Sarah Diaa, Ed Clowes and Scott Shuey, along with guest experts, debate today’s hottest issues in business and its impact on society, industry and politics.
